title: Dencia Wants To Use Breast Milk For Facials
content: By Odebiyi Kabirat Have you ever heard of using breast milk for facials' Controversial pop singer and businesswoman, Dencia is all out to take good care of her skin and in order to get a bay soft skin, she's going to use breast milk for facials to avoid aging. The singer who is well known []The post appeared first on Entertainment Express.
